exceptions.tactic: intros w this s1 s2 H.
exceptions.exn: w is already used.

exceptions.tactic: intros w' this s1 s2 H.
exceptions.exn: this is already used.

exceptions.tactic: intros w' this' s1 s2 H.
exceptions.exn: s1 is already used.

exceptions.tactic: intros w' this' s1' s2 H.
exceptions.exn: s2 is already used.

exceptions.tactic: intros w' this' s1' s2' H.
exceptions.exn: No product even after head-reduction.
In environment w : world this : nid n : nat s1, s2 : state H : network_rely' n s1 s2 Unable to unify "true" with "valid s1".
In environment w : world this : nid n : nat s1, s2 : state H : network_rely' n s1 s2 The term "w" has type "world" while it is expected to have type "Coh ?w ?s".

In environment w : world this : nid n : nat s1, s2 : state H : network_rely' n s1 s2 Unable to unify "network_rely' n s1 s2" with "[/\\ valid w, valid s1, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s1 & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (gets s1 l)]".
In environment w : world this : nid n : nat s1, s2 : state H : network_rely' n s1 s2 The term "w" has type "world" while it is expected to have type "Coh ?w ?s".

In environment w : world this : nid n : nat s1, s2 : state H : network_rely' n s1 s2 The term "w" has type "world" while it is expected to have type "Coh ?w ?s".

In environment w : world this : nid n : nat s1, s2 : state H : network_rely' n s1 s2 Unable to unify "network_rely' n s1 s2" with "[/\\ valid w, valid s1, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s1 & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (gets s1 l)]".
No product even after head-reduction.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment w : world this : nid n : nat s1, s2 : state H : network_rely' n s1 s2 Unable to unify "true" with "valid s2".
In environment w : world this : nid n : nat s1, s2 : state H : network_rely' n s1 s2 The term "w" has type "world" while it is expected to have type "Coh ?w ?s".

In environment w : world this : nid n : nat s1, s2 : state H : network_rely' n s1 s2 Unable to unify "network_rely' n s1 s2" with "[/\\ valid w, valid s2, hook_complete w, dom w.1 =i dom s2 & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (gets s2 l)]".
In environment w : world this : nid n : nat s1, s2 : state H : network_rely' n s1 s2 The term "w" has type "world" while it is expected to have type "Coh ?w ?s".

original: intros w this s1 s2 H. split. - unfold Coh. split; [|split; [|split]]. + apply (cohW w s1). apply H. + apply (cohS w s1). apply H. + apply (cohH w s1). apply H. + apply (cohD w s1). apply H. + intros l. apply (coh_coh w s1 l). apply H. - unfold Coh. split; [|split; [|split]]. + apply (cohW w s2). apply H. + apply (cohS w s2). apply H. + apply (cohH w s2). apply H. + apply (cohD w s2). apply H. + intros l. apply (coh_coh w s2 l). apply H.
